MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance string[] GetApplicationProtocols() cil managed

Docs.summary: Returns a prioritized array of application-layer protocol names that can be negotiated over the SSL/TLS protocols.
Docs.returns: a non-null, possibly zero-length array of application protocol Strings. The array is ordered based on protocol preference, with protocols[0] being the most preferred.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void SetApplicationProtocols(string[] protocols) cil managed

Docs.param: an ordered array of application protocols, with protocols[0] being the most preferred. If the array is empty (zero-length), protocol indications will not be used.
Docs.summary: Sets the prioritized array of application-layer protocol names that can be negotiated over the SSL/TLS protocols.
